document.full_text: president ali abdullah saleh left yemen and flew into saudi arabia on sunday for medical treatment, pitching yemen deeper into turmoil after months of protests against his three-decade rule.
document.title: yemeni president leaves country for medical treatment
lines_and_colors: president ali abdullah saleh left yemen and flew into saudi arabia on sunday for medical treatment, pitching yemen deeper into turmoil after months of protests against his three-decade rule.
